title: Book Club — 'Annihilation' (Ep. 154)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald present their second installment of the Double Down Book Club as they review and discuss ‘Annihilation’ by Jeff VanderMeer (0:30). Later they are joined by VanderMeer himself to talk about the process of creating the Southern Reach trilogy (19:35).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
